text: Isabelle is a fictional character from the Animal Crossing series of video games. She is a kindly Shih Tzu from the 2012 release Animal Crossing: New Leaf, where she is the secretary to the player character. Isabelle is one of the most prominent characters in the Animal Crossing franchise and its mascot. Her popularity has also led to appearances outside the Animal Crossing series, including a playable role in the crossover fighting game Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2012 Category:Animal Crossing Category:Nintendo video game characters
title: Isabelle (Animal Crossing)
